data.message: M happy wid facebook but last days i find on my fake accnt on facebook same name same pic hows itz possible i want find that persn who make dis account facebook team please help us m worried about that......

replies.message: Hi Navneet. Fake Timelines created to imitate real people are not allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be you, we recommend reporting it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2qxzctf. If you've been blocked by the profile, please ask a friend to report it. -Jessica
But that people blockd me how can i reprt this profile
Frnds report it but id is workng still how can i do

Screen shot it next time. File a report showing that screenshot. Oh and a few corrections to your comments: blocked* report* friends* its* this* me* haha you shortened "me" to "m"... just curious, what do you do with your extra time saved from short hand?
